com.elbukkit.plugins.crowd.events
Class CreatureMoveEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      com.elbukkit.plugins.crowd.events.CreatureMoveEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, org.bukkit.event.Cancellable
public class CreatureMoveEvent
extends java.util.EventObject
implements org.bukkit.event.Cancellable

A simple event event that fires when a creature moves a whole block.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Andrew Querol(winsock)
